articles.title: Rory McIlroy suffers yet another near miss in his bid to win a first major since 2014 at The Open - Daily Mail
articles.description: RIATH AL-SAMARRAI: McIlroy was left needing to chip in for eagle at the last to force a play-off, but he suffered the pain of yet another near-miss in his bid to win a first major since 2014.
articles.content:
Rory McIlroy was close to tears after admitting he let The Open 'slip away' in a thrilling final-day at St Andrews that eventually saw Australia's Cameron Smith lift the Claret Jug.

articles.title: Erik ten Hag's Man United preseason is all about training, and he won't let a world tour get in the way of that - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Preseason tours often include significant media and marketing responsibilities, but at Man United, Erik ten Hag is focusing only on the football.
articles.content:
